creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: two separate rectangular pieces strung on one band; white tops; identical bottom halves appliqued and cross stitched in yellow, red and green geometric designs, bordered in black, with 2 1/2" green fringe
title: Sash (?), from a three-piece set
